metadata.title: CVE-2018-8798 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Readin function rdpsnd_process_ping() that results in an information leak.

criterions.comment: rdesktop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
